main event: A civilian in Sacramento, California reported a ground-visual UFO sighting in August 1955. The object was described as the size of a pea, flat and amber in color, and it disappeared in the south, west, and then overhead. The conclusion stated that it was possibly attributed to jet exhaust or after-burner, and was likely a jet aircraft.
interesting points: The object made strange maneuvers, including a 90-degree turn and climbing straight out of sight.
The report includes details of multiple witnesses, including individuals aged 17, 34, and 40, as well as a housewife.
The document contains coded references and communication details between different military units and authorities.
No photographs were included in the report.
